subject: Attn Dear,
body:
Attn Dear,
We have successfully sent your first payment of $5000 this afternoon
and it's available now for your pick at western union menu, the $5000
was sent to you by our officer  Mr Azubike Nnekwe and we are  looking
forward to hear from you immediately you pick up the $5000, so that we
can further transfer the rest of your payment.
Please Make sure you track the Mtcn Number by yourself first before
going to the western union agent office there to pick up $5000 ok,
Then revert back to us immediately you pick up the first payment $5000
so that we can proceed to transfer the second payment immediately so
that we can proceed to send the second payment to you today.
Just click this below link to track the mtcn number by yourself to
confirm your $5000.
https: // www. westernunion.com/global-service/tracktransfer
MTCN:-                  143-819-9906
Senders First name:-    Azubike
Sender Last name:-      Nnekwe
Amount transfer:-        $5000usd
Regards
Mr. Peter Charles,
MTCN:_143-819-9906_$5000usd

subject: Re: Attn Dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Peter Charles,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the update regarding the payment. Could you please provide me with more details about the first payment? How much is it and what is the purpose of this payment?

Also, I would like to know how I can track the Mtcn Number by myself. Could you guide me through the process? I want to make sure everything is in order before going to the Western Union agent office.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Evelyn

subject: Re: Attn Dear,
body:
Attn Dear,

immediately you send the money you will pick it to your country

So be advise to send the $250 immediately so that we will register your
payment and  start receiving $5000usd. as from Today. Be advise that
there is no time again for us to call any person on phone unless you
will call +229 54599995 After the payment of $250. you will start
receiving your money every day $5000usd through Western Union and
western union until the full payment of $950,000,00 is completed. So what
you will be receiving per day is $5000usd.

Therefore you are requested to send the fee via Western Union or Money
Gram or RIA money transfer with below information;

Receivers name: JUDE AFOY
Country:Cotonou ; Benin Republic
Amount required: $250.00
Sender's Name:
MTCN#:
Sender’s address:

The moment I receive the payment of $250.00 i will release the first
payment information’s of $5000usd to you and you will pick up the
money and i will send you another payment for pick up.

Regards
Mr. Peter Charles,

-- 
Hello Beneficiary,

Your payment file came to our office with authorized approval from the
Africa Development Bank to pay your fund via Bitcoin wallet account.
As a result of failures from bank international wire transfers,
diplomatic system delivery, online banking transfer etc. they mandated
that all the affected scam victims  who have not received their funds
shall be compensated. The total sum US$1,450,000.00 has been approved
to your name and you shall receive it through a Bitcoin Wallet
account.  You will receive your fund without any problem or blockage.

We advise you to re-confirm your information to verify it properly.

1. A copy of your passport
2. Your current home address
3. Your private telephone number
4. Forward to us the previous payment receipts you made to the scammers.

Re-confirm your information to the Payment Unit
email:ja5186200@gmail.com

We await your response with your information to enable us to submit it
to the reimbursement officer.

YOURS IN SERVICE!

Thomas White
IMF Representative
Benin Republic

subject: Re: Attn Dear,
body:
Hello Mr. Peter Charles and Mr. Thomas White,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my payment. I appreciate your assistance in helping me receive my funds. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Can you please provide more details about the Bitcoin wallet account? How does it work and how can I set it up?

2. Is there any specific reason why the previous methods of bank wire transfers, diplomatic system delivery, and online banking transfer failed? I want to understand the situation better.

3. Could you explain what you mean by "scam victims"? Have there been fraudulent activities involved in this process?

4. Is it possible for me to receive the funds through a different method, such as a direct bank transfer or a check? I would feel more comfortable with those options.

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed with receiving my payment.

Best wishes,
Evelyn

subject: Re: Attn Dear,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. Can you please provide more details about how the Bitcoin wallet account works for receiving the payment? I'm interested in understanding the process better.

Best wishes,
Evelyn
